content.rendered:
With so many options out there to choose from it can be tricky to know the best iPhone to buy. But, you need not worry as our iPhone buying guide has everything you need to find the best iPhone model for you and your needs.

Whether you’re looking for the latest technology, camera quality and battery life, or simply looking for the best iPhone that is value for money – we have something for everyone.

There are a variety of things to consider when choosing a new phone; and first of all, you need to consider what functionalities you most desire. There are a few things you may want to think about before starting your purchasing journey such as whether you want 5G connectivity, whether you need the latest camera or technology on the market or whether you simply just want the most on-trend handset available. Whatever it is that you’re looking for, there will certainly be an iPhone for you.

The Apple Brand

Apple was founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne. The first product sold by Apple was the Apple I personal computer, and from there the company continued to develop various computers – including the original Macintosh. In the late 1980s, Wozniak and Jobs stepped back from the company – taking on separate ventures.

After a rocky few years in competition with Microsoft, Apple brought Steve Jobs back who guided Apple to profitability and introduced the likes of the iMac, iPod, iPhone and iPad.

Now we know Apple as one of the most successful tech companies in the world and as of January 2021, it was the most valuable company in the world.

The iPhone

Apple CEO, Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone in January 2007. The handset, which wouldn’t hit the shelves for another 6 months, was criticised as being too expensive for the market however looking back now we can see how the iPhone’s success condemned its critics’ remarks.

Over the last 15 years, the iPhone has evolved to welcome various new internet speeds – first 3G, then 4G and now 5G. We have witnessed a range of camera updates – including the launch of the selfie camera and launches of key features we know today such as Siri, location services, Apple Music and accessories such as AirPods.

What is the Latest iPhone?

The latest iPhone is the iPhone 13 range – featuring the iPhone 13, iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 13 Pro and iPhone 13 Pro Max.

The iPhone 13 range release saw praise for the updated camera and battery life. The iPhone 13 saw an increase in battery life of up to 99hrs, a 12MP camera and superfast 5G. Within the range is also the updated iPhone 13 Pro which featured the biggest Pro camera upgrade ever – with a 12MP Telephoto, Wide and Ultra-Wide camera. The camera system also offers night mode, 4K Dolby Vision and HDR recording.

What is the Best iPhone?

iPhone Range

The iPhone range is the standard release of each iPhone – now we typically see four versions of new iPhones being released. The four are iPhone, iPhone Mini, iPhone Pro and iPhone Pro Max. Each handset features a range of exciting tech updates and new features.

The iPhone range contains plenty of exciting updates, and typically is priced at a lower point than its pro counterparts.

iPhone Pro Range

The iPhone Pro range takes the handset a little bit further in terms of camera quality and technical specifications. Apple defines its Pro models as the handset for those who want to get the most out of their device.

iPhone Pro Max Range

The iPhone Pro Max range typically has the exact same feature set as the iPhone Pro but in a bigger size. With the iPhone 13 Pro and Pro Max, the Pro Max also has a larger battery capacity.

iPhone SE Range

The iPhone SE range is Apple’s mid-range device range and offers a whole host of features you would find on the flagship range but at a lower cost. The SE range is perfect for those looking to own an iPhone and experience a range of features without the higher price point.

Which iPhone Has the Best Camera?

Each iPhone release sees an improvement in camera quality – and the iPhone Pro ranges take that one step further. Therefore, currently, we can say that the iPhone 13 Pro and Pro Max have the best camera. Both models feature:

  • Dual 12MP/12MP front camera
  • Triple 12MP/12MP/12MP rear camera featuring a wide, telephoto and ultra-wide lens
  • 4K Dolby Vision and HDR recording

When Does the New iPhone Come Out?

Typically, we can expect to see a new iPhone launched around September time each year – this has been the case for the past few years. We don’t know much about the next iPhone launch but we are excited to see what improvements Apple have up their sleeve.

Which iPhone Should I Buy?

iPhone 13 Range

The latest range from Apple features four models:

  • iPhone 13
  • iPhone 13 Mini
  • iPhone 13 Pro
  • iPhone 13 Pro Max

All four models see a huge upgrade from the previous device and have some of the best camera and battery technology available.

The iPhone 13 features the most advanced dual-camera system ever seen on an iPhone, the fastest chip; A15 Bionic chipset and one of the biggest advances in battery life we’ve seen. With superfast 5G and a super durable and timeless design, this handset has impressed us all. You have various colour choices when it comes to the iPhone 13, including Midnight, Red, Blue, Pink and Starlight (white). The iPhone 13 also comes in a smaller size, the iPhone 13 Mini – perfect for smaller hands and compact enough to fit in pockets and handbags – the Mini features all the same technology just in a handy size.

If you’re looking to elevate your handset that bit further, we recommend you try the iPhone 13 Pro and Pro Max. If you enjoy taking photos on your device and need that little bit of extra battery life, we think the swish 13 Pro range is for you. You can impress your friends with the latest technology and take all the best images of your social life, landscapes, wildlife and more with the triple 12MP rear camera.

iPhone 12 Range

The iPhone 12 was 2020’s flagship range and saw the introduction of a clean new design and a breadth of colourways. It was also the first time we saw the introduction of the iPhone Mini. The iPhone 12 range’s main updates included increased power and the introduction of 5G. In the iPhone 12 range we see:

  • iPhone 12
  • iPhone 12 Mini
  • iPhone 12 Pro
  • iPhone 12 Pro Max

Similar to the 13, the iPhone 12 and 12 Mini see a dual rear camera whereas the Pro and Pro Max see a triple-lens rear camera. The differences between the standard and pro ranges remain similar – improved camera and battery life.

The iPhone 12 range features the A14 Bionic chip, therefore providing great speeds and power.

iPhone 11

With the iPhone 11, we saw the very first Pro and Pro Max additions, as well as a change in screen size and camera improvements. To this day the iPhone 11 range remains a great choice for a powerful phone with great image quality.

You can get a whole host of colour options with the iPhone 11, including Black, White, Green, Yellow, Red and Purple.

iPhone XR and XS

Subsequent releases from the iPhone X are the XR and XS. The iPhone XR and iPhone XS were released at the same time – with the XR being a lower-cost version of the XS. There isn’t a massive difference between the two phones, but the XS features better screen quality, sleeker design and the inclusion of 3D touch.

iPhone SE (2020)

Finally, we have the iPhone SE (2020). This phone is perfect for someone on a budget who still wants to invest in an iPhone. This affordable iPhone model still offers fantastic performance with an advanced camera system and a powerful chipset.

Shop iPhone Deals at Fonehouse

At Fonehouse we have a variety of iPhone models and deals available. We work with a range of networks, to help you find the best deal – based on what you need from your device. If you have any queries surrounding your next iPhone or any other questions about your phone don’t hesitate to get in touch with us on 0333 900 1133. Our UK-based call centre is on hand and ready to help you out.

Shop iPhone deals at Fonehouse today to find the right model for you.
